title: How to Make Peanut Butter Jelly Oatmeal

steps.headline: Pour some water into a saucepan and boil it over medium heat.
Once the water has started to bubble, add in the oats and banana to the pot.
Simmer until liquid is absorbed.
steps.description: Allow the oats to cook making sure you stir occasionally to prevent any burning.

steps.headline: Scoop the peanut butter into the oatmeal.
Scoop the oatmeal into a clean bowl once done cooking.
Add some more peanut butter along with the jelly and stir together.
steps.description: Sprinkle the chopped peanuts on top for added crunch.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Put a spoon into the oatmeal and you can eat your yummy creation!

text: Pour some water into a saucepan and boil it over medium heat.  Once the water has started to bubble, add in the oats and banana to the pot.  Simmer until liquid is absorbed. Allow the oats to cook making sure you stir occasionally to prevent any burning. Scoop the peanut butter into the oatmeal. Stir until well combined. Scoop the oatmeal into a clean bowl once done cooking.  Add some more peanut butter along with the jelly and stir together. Sprinkle the chopped peanuts on top for added crunch. Serve. Put a spoon into the oatmeal and you can eat your yummy creation!
